================
Documentation
================

Welcome to u8timeseries real documentation! 


Here you will find all the information you need to use the API, as well as some example notebooks to get more familiar with the API.


The API
========

   :maxdepth: 3


   api/u8timeseries.TimeSeries
   api/u8timeseries.models
   api/u8timeseries.metrics
   api/u8timeseries.statistics
   api/u8timeseries.backtesting
   


Air Passenger Example
=======================

You will find below an example Jupyter notebook containing an analysis of the well-known Air Passenger Dataset.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   Air-passengers-example.ipynb
